import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Button, Form, Container } from 'react-bootstrap' import Service from '../../service/Auth.service' class SignupForm extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this._service = new Service() this.state = { username: '', password: '', role: "" } } handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() const { username, password } = this.state this._service.signup(username, password) .then(theNewUser => { this.props.setUser(theNewUser.data) this.setState({ username: '', password: '' }) this.props.history.push('/this.state.role') // REDIRECCIONAMIENTO }) .catch(err => console.log(err.response.data.message)) } handleInputChange = e => { let { name, value } = e.target this.setState({ [name]: value }) } render() { return (

Registro

Contrase√±a Apellido Tipo de Usuario
) } } export default SignupForm
